title: Damage scales faster and harder than defense.
body:
Which is the core issue of the game right now.
Which is the reason that tanks are unplayable, which is the reason you are getting oneshotted by someone with just a slight lead.

You can't invest all your gold into defense, because otherwise you won't do damage.
Staying alive longer in fights to soak damage is no longer a win condition for tanks, because you don't soak damage, you just pop.

The universal win condition has changed to 
"Oneshot them before they can oneshot you"

And i gotta admit, it ain't fun, riot.
##We need balance between offense and defense

Also tanks ARE viable, you can play shen, malphite, maokai, poppy, orn, there are just not so many tanks in the game since they separated tanks and juggernauts.

You don't understand that that tank items cost gold too. 

If one and half MR item + investing runes in AP is not enough to soak a rotation of a mage (which Tanks should counter) on a similar gold budget, then we go back to OP point: damage scales faster AND harder than defense.

If we want to be specific, Nunu build couldn't be different. Cinderhulk is a must, and if the enemy is not full AP, dead man's plate is necessary too. The rest is rightful gold investment in MR, which is proven completely useless because again, damage > defense. 

To you that argue that an artillery mage rotation should remove 60% of hp of a tank, remember that that tank must also soak damage from DPS sources (which should counter tanks), from the frontline and maybe from the jungle. I.e. a tank must survive from multiple damage sources of both types. Arguing that a single source (that I add, should be sub-optimal on tanks) should almost do the job by itself, instantly on a burst, seems almost madness.

PS: Maokai and Ornn are laughable, if you have doubts play them top against riven/Darius/Renekton etc. The others range from mediocre to good, but they're played for their damage, and not their tankiness. Check out the damage Shen/Malph does actually do after the buffs, it's quite crazy.

I miss the old league where you had the decision between survivability or damage, and both were equally strong. 
This entire game is all about who can snowball the fastest, who can deal dmg the fastest and finish the fight the fastest. It's a shame, honestly.

On a recent episode of The Dive, they talked about how China's playerbase is easily 6x or more that of the entire western base combined. This is also the type of environment that Chinese players tend to enjoy. High damage, fast paced bloodbaths. It's really no wonder they have been ignoring us and trending the game even farther down this path. That's where the money is.

And if people want to know why Darius fucks you in the ass harder now compared to last season, its because % Pen got reworked to include base, so everyone's % Pen was changed except Yasuo's (for good reason). % Pen should have been Half Base + Half Bonus at least.

Rito went through so much to try and make him a tank again. With the changes to his passive making him larger with more armor and his stats were supposedly scaling better with armor too. Still.... no tank malphite. 
Wanna know why? why would I go tank Malphite when you can chunk/slow people with a Q that not only is back up within a couple seconds, but grants A SIGNIFICANT amount of movement speed to run away till it is back up. I was singed with boots of swiftness and I could not catch up with him while ulting or using my W. That is ridiculous and makes no sense. Then pair this up with his full combo? He can blow up basically anyone on my team and nearly would one shot me with full MR. Am I saying he is broken?? no, obviously you just need to work around dodging his ult and he becomes useless. My point thought is why does he have such significant AP stats if he is supposed to be a tank????? So I 100% agree with you. I would say Rito's balance team is too focused on TFT, but their balance team has continued to be more useless than the degree I got in 2017. 
My point being that even on this single champ meant to be a tank, it is far better to go damage than tank build. Even in the jungle right now Nunu is only strong because his stats are insane and he is about to be nerfed. Other than that, the main junglers are bruisers or assassins
